sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import Flicking from "@egjs/react-flicking";

import {Container, View, Text, BackgroundImage} from '../../../atoms'

const SliderCategories = () => {

    return (
        <Container padding="100px 0 0 100px" isEqualHeight="50vh" flexDirection="column">
            <View margin=" 0 50px 0 0">
                <Text family="daily" size="32">Categories</Text>
            </View>
            <View>
            <Flicking id="stories-categories" gap={50} infinite={true} infiniteThreshold={100}  bound={true} moveType="freeScroll" style={{width:100+'%'}}>
                <View>
                    <BackgroundImage src="/static/unsplash/nourdine-diouane-HITtu6zs9Sg-unsplash.jpg" width="500px" height="150px" size="cover" radius="15px">
                        <Text>Adventures</Text>
                    </BackgroundImage>
                </View>
                <View>
                    <BackgroundImage src="/static/unsplash/freddy-castro-u3ajSXhZM_U-unsplash.jpg" width="500px" height="150px" size="cover" radius="15px">
                        <Text>Adventures</Text>
                    </BackgroundImage>
                </View>
                <View>
                    <BackgroundImage src="/static/unsplash/sincerely-media-nGrfKmtwv24-unsplash.jpg" width="500px" height="150px" size="cover" radius="15px">
                        <Text>Adventures</Text>
                    </BackgroundImage>
                </View>

            </Flicking>
            </View>
        </Container>
    )
}

export default SliderCategories
